title: Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick, Putty Matte
descriptions:
**Discover the Ultimate Eye Artistry with Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick, Putty Matte**

Elevate your makeup game with the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick in Putty Matte. This innovative eyeshadow stick is a game-changer for those who want a flawless, long-lasting look without the hassle. Whether you're a makeup enthusiast or a beginner, this versatile product is designed to suit all skill levels and skin types, especially those with sensitive skin.

**Key Features:**

- **Highly Pigmented & Matte Finish:** The Putty Matte shade offers a light taupe-pink color that is perfect for creating a subtle, sophisticated look. Its highly pigmented formula ensures that a little goes a long way, providing rich color payoff with minimal effort.

- **Crème-to-Powder Formula:** This unique formula glides on smoothly and dries down to a long-lasting, crease-proof finish. The transition from crème to powder ensures that your eyeshadow stays in place throughout the day, no matter where your adventures take you.

- **Waterproof & Crease-Proof:** Say goodbye to smudges and creases. This eyeshadow stick is designed to withstand sweat, tears, and humidity, making it ideal for any occasion, from a sunny beach day to an evening out.

- **Nourishing Ingredients:** Enriched with Vitamin C, Vitamin E, and Candelilla Wax, this eyeshadow not only enhances your look but also cares for your skin. These ingredients provide antioxidant protection, improve skin tone and texture, and offer nourishment and hydration to the delicate eye area.

- **Easy Application:** No brushes? No problem! This eyeshadow stick comes with a built-in smudger for seamless blending. Simply sweep the stick directly onto your eyelids, coat the smudger with color, and blend before the formula sets for a perfectly diffused look.

- **Versatile Shades:** While the Putty Matte is a beautiful neutral, Julep offers a range of 30 shades in matte, shimmer, and metallic finishes, allowing you to create a variety of looks to match your mood or the occasion.

**Why Choose Julep Eyeshadow 101?**

- **Suitable for All Skin Types:** Even the most sensitive skin can enjoy the benefits of this eyeshadow stick, thanks to its gentle, dermatologically-tested formula.
- **Travel-Friendly:** Compact and portable, this eyeshadow stick is perfect for on-the-go touch-ups and fits easily into your makeup bag or purse.
- **Buildable Coverage:** Whether you prefer a soft, natural look or a bold, dramatic statement, the buildable formula allows you to customize your color intensity.

Transform your eye makeup routine with the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick, Putty Matte. Experience the perfect blend of beauty and functionality that will keep you looking fabulous all day long!
